[center][font size=4]Jackett Change Log[/font][/center] [b]17.04.2017:[/b] Mono 4.8 using inhouse baseimage. [b]23.09.2016:[/b] Remove autoupdate. [b]06.08.2016:[/b] Rebase to alpine linux. [b]26.01.2016:[/b] Initial Release.
Container.Name: jackett
Container.Description: Jackett works as a proxy server it translates queries from apps like Sonarr etc into tracker-site-specific http queries and parses the html response sending results back to the requesting software.[br] [br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Storing all jackett config files [br] [b]/downloads[/b] : Point to torrent blackhole [br]
Container.Overview: Jackett works as a proxy server it translates queries from apps like Sonarr etc into tracker-site-specific http queries and parses the html response sending results back to the requesting software.[
